raw_comment: I noticed that the larger states, have different times they see spring bloom, whereas the smaller states, normally see spring in the same month. I hypothesize this is because the smaller states have less land to cover and the larger states have more.
ace_sentences: I noticed that larger states have different times when they see spring bloom.
I noticed that smaller states normally see spring in the same month.
I hypothesize that this is because smaller states have less land to cover.
I hypothesize that this is because larger states have more land to cover.
